reviews.review_msg: Amazing, wonderful, caring, exciting, real teacher. This class was so much more than I expected. Would take it over again just for fun.

Barb is one of the best professors I've had at SFU. She knows so much about museums and is willing to share her knowledge. Her communication for projects are not amazing which leads to confusion but her lectures are very interesting. If you are looking to get into the museum field, Barb is a good person to know but she has high expectations.
